mapper.sql: A.ID as A_ID, A.NAME as A_NAME, A.ENTITY_NAME as A_ENTITY_NAME, A.PROPERTY_NAME as A_PROPERTY_NAME, A.SITE_ID as A_SITE_ID, A.DESCRIPTION as A_DESCRIPTION, A.TYPE as A_TYPE, A.RECORD_STATUS as A_RECORD_STATUS, A.UPDATE_COUNT as A_UPDATE_COUNT, A.CREATOR_ID as A_CREATOR_ID, A.CREATE_DATE as A_CREATE_DATE, A.UPDATER_ID as A_UPDATER_ID, A.UPDATE_DATE as A_UPDATE_DATE, A.SEQ as A_SEQ
mapper.select:
select
from ORG_USER_PROPERTIES A
order by
${orderBy}
mapper.insert:
select LAST_INSERT_ID()
insert into ORG_USER_PROPERTIES ( NAME, ENTITY_NAME, PROPERTY_NAME, SITE_ID, DESCRIPTION, TYPE, RECORD_STATUS, UPDATE_COUNT, CREATOR_ID, CREATE_DATE, UPDATER_ID, UPDATE_DATE, SEQ) values ( #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{propertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{updateCount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL})
mapper.update:
update ORG_USER_PROPERTIES A
A.ID = #{record.id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{record.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.ENTITY_NAME = #{record.entityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.PROPERTY_NAME = #{record.propertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.SITE_ID = #{record.siteId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.DESCRIPTION = #{record.description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
A.TYPE = #{record.type,jdbcType=CHAR},
A.RECORD_STATUS = #{record.recordStatus,jdbcType=CHAR},

A.CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{record.createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{record.updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{record.updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.SEQ = #{record.seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},

update ORG_USER_PROPERTIES A
A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.NAME = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

A.PROPERTY_NAME = #{propertyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

A.CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.UPDATER_ID = #{updaterId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
A.UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
A.SEQ = #{seq,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
